name: The Uniquely Eugene Podcast
blurb: A podcast dedicated to highlighting the unique stories, ideas, and perspectives of the people in Eugene, Oregon.

name: Nubian Scientist - The Africa of Science and Innovation
blurb: A magazine and debate space for science and innovation in Africa and its diasporas.

name: Sciences Inutiles : anecdotes de sciences
blurb: Des vidéos pleines d'anecdotes scientifiques, pour YouTube, beaucoup plus qualitatives.

name: BELLE – Die Fashionmagazin-Parodie
blurb: Hund Couture für Trendsetter und alle anderen Rassen. Plus: jede Menge beißende Satire

name: House of Stitched Magazine
blurb: House of Stitched: a dark art and fiction digest magazine giving creators real-life advice and interviews with experts in their field.

name: Best Movie Ever: An Oral History of Josie & the Pussycats
blurb: An audiobook and Spanish-language translation of "Best Movie Ever: An Oral History of Kaplan & Elfont's Josie and the Pussycats"

name: The Local Reporter: Hyperlocal Investigative Journalism
blurb: The Local Reporter will investigate why our community is failing to provide affordable housing for its neediest citizens.

name: Ohio Public Employees Retirement System Investigation
blurb: An independent forensic investigation of the Ohio Public Employees Retirement System.

name: 《 日不落之味 》線上誌 / A food Zine to grow Hope
blurb: 誌在慢燉一鍋亂世希望 / Keep stewing in the midst of nowhere

blurb: Magazine di informazione sul mondo magico di Harry Potter e Animali fantastici.

name: Grammar Geek content booster
blurb: Help me bring the internet's home of of GCSE, A-level language study and Oxbridge language applications to the next level!

name: Bad Mommy
blurb: Bad Mommy - a[n embarrassingly colossal] written collection of motherly fuckups in “90’s zine” form and my random solutions to them.
